description: 卡通农场(Hay Day)游戏中的动物英语词汇

cards.definition_zh: 鸡是农场中最基础的动物,在1级就可以解锁。母鸡每隔一段时间会产下鸡蛋,鸡蛋可以用于制作煎蛋、蛋糕等多种食品。鸡需要放在鸡舍中饲养,并定期喂食鸡饲料。
cards.definition_en: The first farm animal you unlock. Chickens lay eggs regularly, which are essential ingredients for many recipes like bacon and eggs, cakes, and cookies.
cards.example_en: Feed your chickens regularly to collect fresh eggs every day.
cards.example_zh: 定期喂养你的鸡以每天收集新鲜鸡蛋。

cards.definition_zh: 奶牛在6级解锁,是农场的重要动物。奶牛每隔一段时间会产出牛奶,牛奶可以用于制作奶油、黄油、奶酪、冰淇淋等多种乳制品。奶牛需要住在牛棚里,并喂食牛饲料。
cards.definition_en: Cows produce milk, which is used to make cream, butter, cheese, and ice cream. They must be housed in cow sheds and fed with cow feed.
cards.example_en: Your cows produce fresh milk that can be turned into delicious dairy products.
cards.example_zh: 你的奶牛生产新鲜牛奶,可以制成美味的乳制品。

cards.definition_zh: 猪在10级解锁。猪可以生产培根,这是一种美味的腌制猪肉,可用于制作培根鸡蛋、培根派等食品。猪需要住在猪圈里,并喂食猪饲料。
cards.definition_en: Pigs produce bacon, a cured meat product used in recipes like bacon and eggs, bacon pie, and hamburgers. Pigs live in pig pens and eat pig feed.
cards.example_en: Raise pigs on your farm to harvest bacon for cooking delicious meals.
cards.example_zh: 在农场饲养猪来收获培根烹饪美味佳肴。

cards.definition_zh: 绵羊在16级解锁。绵羊生产羊毛,羊毛是制作各种纺织品的重要原料,可以用来制作毛衣、羊毛帽、羊毛裤等服装。绵羊需要住在羊圈里,并喂食羊饲料。
cards.definition_en: Sheep produce wool, which is essential for making clothing items like sweaters, woolly hats, and wooly chaps. They live in sheep pens and need sheep feed.
cards.example_en: Shear your sheep regularly to collect soft wool for knitting warm clothes.
cards.example_zh: 定期剪你的羊毛来收集柔软的羊毛编织保暖衣物。

cards.definition_zh: 山羊在32级解锁。山羊生产羊奶,羊奶可以用来制作山羊奶酪、披萨等特色食品。山羊需要住在山羊棚里,并喂食山羊饲料。
cards.definition_en: Goats produce goat milk, which is used to make goat cheese and pizza. Goats need goat sheds and goat feed to thrive.
cards.example_en: Goat milk makes excellent cheese that customers love in pizza recipes.
cards.example_zh: 羊奶制作出顾客喜爱的优质奶酪,用于披萨配方。

cards.definition_zh: 蜜蜂在39级解锁。蜜蜂生产蜂巢,蜂巢可以加工成蜂蜜。蜂蜜是一种天然甜味剂,可用于制作蜂蜜爆米花、蜂蜜苹果蛋糕等美食。蜜蜂住在蜂箱里,不需要喂食。
cards.definition_en: Honey bees produce honeycombs, which can be processed into honey. Honey is a natural sweetener used in many recipes. Bees live in beehives and don't require feed.
cards.example_en: Your bees work hard to produce sweet honey for delicious treats.
cards.example_zh: 你的蜜蜂勤劳工作生产甜美的蜂蜜制作美味佳肴。

cards.definition_zh: 鸭子在50级解锁。鸭子生产鸭毛,鸭毛可以用来制作枕头、羽绒服等舒适的产品。鸭子需要住在鸭舍里,并喂食鸭饲料。
cards.definition_en: Ducks produce duck feathers, which are used to make pillows and down jackets. Ducks live in duck salons and need to be fed duck feed.
cards.example_en: Collect duck feathers to craft soft, comfortable pillows for your customers.
cards.example_zh: 收集鸭毛为顾客制作柔软舒适的枕头。

cards.definition_zh: 鱼类在27级随渔湖解锁。不同于其他农场动物,鱼需要在渔湖中垂钓捕获。鱼可以加工成鱼片,用于制作炸鱼薯条、寿司等海鲜菜肴。
cards.definition_en: Fish are caught in the fishing lake and can be processed into fish fillets. Used to make fish and chips, sushi, and other seafood dishes.
cards.example_en: Catch fresh fish from the lake and fillet them for tasty seafood recipes.
cards.example_zh: 从湖中捕捉新鲜的鱼并切成鱼片做美味的海鲜菜肴。

cards.definition_zh: 龙虾在44级解锁,在渔湖中捕获。龙虾可以加工成龙虾尾,这是一种高级海鲜食材,用于制作各种精致菜肴。
cards.definition_en: Lobsters are caught in the fishing lake and provide lobster tails, a premium seafood ingredient used in gourmet recipes.
cards.example_en: Lobster tails are a delicacy that fetch high prices at the roadside shop.
cards.example_zh: 龙虾尾是一种美味佳肴,在路边小店可以卖高价。

cards.definition_zh: 松鼠在62级解锁。松鼠会收集花生,花生可以用于制作花生酱、花生糖等食品。松鼠需要住在松鼠屋里。
cards.definition_en: Squirrels collect peanuts, which are used to make peanut butter, peanut brittle, and other snacks. They live in squirrel houses.
cards.example_en: Watch your squirrels gather peanuts to make tasty peanut butter.
cards.example_zh: 看你的松鼠收集花生来制作美味的花生酱。

cards.definition_zh: 狗是人类忠实的朋友。在游戏中,狗作为宠物可以在农场自由活动,喂养它们可以获得经验值和道具奖励。
cards.definition_en: Man's best friend. Dogs are pets that roam freely on the farm and provide experience and rewards when fed.

cards.definition_zh: 猫是可爱的宠物,喜欢在农场四处探索。喂养猫咪可以获得各种奖励。
cards.definition_en: Cute pets that love to explore the farm. Feeding cats provides various rewards.

cards.definition_zh: 马是优雅的大型宠物。农场上可以饲养多种品种的马,它们可以在农场自由奔跑。
cards.definition_en: Elegant large pets. Various breeds of horses can run freely on the farm.

cards.definition_zh: 兔子是小巧可爱的宠物,蹦蹦跳跳非常活泼。
cards.definition_en: Small and cute pets that hop around energetically.

cards.definition_zh: 驴是温顺的工作动物,在农场作为宠物饲养。
cards.definition_en: A gentle working animal kept as a pet on the farm.

cards.definition_zh: 豚鼠是小型可爱的宠物,毛茸茸的非常讨人喜欢。
cards.definition_en: Small, adorable, and fluffy pets that are very lovable.

cards.definition_zh: 孔雀是美丽的异国鸟类,拥有华丽的羽毛,可以装点农场。
cards.definition_en: A beautiful exotic bird with magnificent feathers that decorates your farm.

cards.definition_zh: 大象是陆地上最大的动物,拥有长长的鼻子和大耳朵。在保护区中,可以饲养成年大象和小象。
cards.definition_en: The largest land animal with a long trunk and big ears. Both adults and calves can be raised in the sanctuary.

cards.definition_zh: 长颈鹿拥有世界上最长的脖子,可以吃到高处的树叶。它们的斑点图案非常独特。
cards.definition_en: Has the world's longest neck to reach high leaves. Each giraffe's spot pattern is unique.

cards.definition_zh: 河马是半水生的大型哺乳动物,喜欢在水中度过大部分时间,但实际上不会游泳。
cards.definition_en: A large semi-aquatic mammal that spends most of its time in water but cannot actually swim.

cards.definition_zh: 斑马以其独特的黑白条纹而闻名,每只斑马的条纹图案都是独一无二的。
cards.definition_en: Famous for its unique black and white stripes. Each zebra's stripe pattern is one of a kind.

cards.definition_zh: 大猩猩是最大的灵长类动物,非常聪明,与人类DNA相似度达98%。
cards.definition_en: The largest primate, highly intelligent with 98% DNA similarity to humans.

cards.definition_zh: 驯鹿生活在寒冷地区,是圣诞老人雪橇队的成员。它们的鹿角非常雄伟。
cards.definition_en: Lives in cold regions and is a member of Santa's sleigh team. They have magnificent antlers.

cards.definition_zh: 北极狐生活在极地地区,拥有厚厚的毛皮来抵御严寒。
cards.definition_en: Arctic foxes live in polar regions with thick fur to withstand extreme cold.

cards.definition_zh: 猎豹是陆地上跑得最快的动物,时速可达120公里。它们身上有独特的黑色斑点。
cards.definition_en: The fastest land animal, capable of speeds up to 120 km/h. They have distinctive black spots.

cards.definition_zh: 海象生活在北极地区,拥有长长的獠牙,可以用来在冰上移动和防御。
cards.definition_en: Lives in Arctic regions with long tusks used for moving on ice and defense.

cards.definition_zh: 狐獴是小型群居动物,经常站立起来警戒周围环境,非常机警可爱。
cards.definition_en: Small social animals that often stand upright to watch their surroundings, very alert and adorable.

cards.definition_zh: 企鹅是不会飞的鸟类,擅长游泳,主要生活在南极地区。它们走路摇摇晃晃非常可爱。
cards.definition_en: Flightless birds that excel at swimming, mainly found in Antarctica. Their waddling walk is adorable.

cards.definition_zh: 鸵鸟是世界上最大的鸟类,虽然不会飞,但奔跑速度极快,可达70公里/小时。
cards.definition_en: The world's largest bird. Cannot fly but runs extremely fast, up to 70 km/h.

cards.definition_zh: 水豚是世界上最大的啮齿动物,性格温顺友好,经常被称为'世界上最友好的动物'。
cards.definition_en: The world's largest rodent, known for its gentle and friendly nature. Often called 'the world's friendliest animal'.
